mapper.insert: INSERT INTO busi_app_mail_msg( MSG_PK,SITE_PK,BOX_NAME,M_TITLE,M_CONTENT, LINK_MAN,LINK_PHONE,STS,IS_OPEN,LINK_MAIL, CREATE_TIME, REG,DEPT,POSTCODE,ADDR,SEX,AGE )VALUES( #{MSG_PK},#{SITE_PK},#{BOX_NAME},#{M_TITLE},#{M_CONTENT}, #{LINK_MAN},#{LINK_PHONE},0,#{IS_OPEN},#{LINK_MAIL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{REG,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{DEPT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{POSTCODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ADDR,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{SEX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{AGE,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select MSG_PK,SITE_PK,BOX_NAME,M_TITLE,M_CONTENT, LINK_MAN,LINK_PHONE,STS,IS_OPEN,REPLY_CONTENT, AUDIT_USER,AUDIT_TIME,AUDIT_OPINION,REPLY_USER,REPLY_TIME, AUDIT_USER_NAME,REPLY_USER_NAME,CREATE_TIME,LINK_MAIL, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATE_TIME_STR, DATE_FORMAT(AUDIT_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS AUDIT_TIME_STR, DATE_FORMAT(REPLY_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REPLY_TIME_STR, REG,DEPT,POSTCODE,ADDR,SEX,AGE from busi_app_mail_msg a where MSG_PK = #{MSG_PK}
